description:
Nanako is the spirit inhabiting the Seventh Holy Scripture, http://anidb.net/ch1941 [Ciel`s] most powerful weapon. Originally called only "Seven", even by Ciel, she was named "Nanako" by http://anidb.net/ch1947 [Inui Arihiko].
Since the scripture was created by a soul of a willingly sacrificed young girl merging with a unicorn horn, she has some horse-like properties, like hooves for hands and feet, and a fancy for carrots.
name: Seven
